articles.title: Macy Gray Calls for a Redesign of the U.S. Flag in Juneteenth Essay - E! NEWS
articles.description: For Juneteenth 2021, R&B singer-songwriter Macy Gray penned an essay about why and how the American flag should undergo a "transformation."
articles.content:
Macy Gray thinks it's time to change the flag of the United States of America.
The 53-year-old Grammy-winning R&B singer-songwriter made her comments in an essay posted on the stock market news … [+786 chars]

articles.title: American Ryan Crouser breaks shot put world record - CNN International
articles.description: Ryan Crouser toppled the men's shot put world record on Friday with a 23.37-meter throw on the first night of the US Olympic Track and Field Trials in Eugene, Oregon.
articles.content:

articles.title: Infosys recruited over 19,000 graduates in India: Nandan Nilekani at 40th AGM - Mint
articles.description: Infosys also expanded the US hiring commitment to 25,000 by 2022 with an additional 12,000 new American jobs across a variety of roles.Infosys has expanded its financial commitment towards COVID-19 relief to  ₹200 crore, Nilekani said
